title: En Mel Vizhundha Song Lyrics May Madham
stanzas: <div>En mel vizhuntha mazhai thuliye Song Lyrics May Madham

en mel vizhuntha mazhai thuliye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
indru ezhuthiya en kaviye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai (2)

ennai ezhuppiya poongaatre
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
ennai mayakkiya mellisaiye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai

udambil uraikindra oruyir pol
unakkulthaane naan irundhen

en mel vizhuntha mazhai thuliye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
indru ezhuthiya en kaviye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai

Mannai thiranthaal neer irukkum
en manathai thiranthaal nee iruppaai
oliyai thiranthaal isai irukkum
en uyirai thiranthaal nee iruppaai

vaanam thiranthaal mazhai irukkum
en vayathai thiranthaal nee iruppaai
iravai thiranthaal pagal irukkum
en imaiyai thiranthaal nee iruppaai

en mel vizhuntha mazhai thuliye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
indru ezhuthiya en kaviye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai

Kilaiyum malarum urasugaiyil
enna baashai pesidumo
alaiyum karaiyum urasugaiyil
pesum baashai pesidumo

mannum vinnum urasugaiyil
enna baashai pesidumo
paarvai rendum pesikondaal
baashai oomai aaividumo

en mel vizhuntha mazhai thuliye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
indru ezhuthiya en kaviye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai(2)

ennai ezhuppiya poongaatre

ennai mayakkiya mellisaiye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai

udambil uraikindra oruyir pol
unakkulthaane naan irundhen

indru ezhuthiya en kaviye
iththanai naalaai engirunthaai
